video_info.title: Indian Idol
video_info.shortDescription: Indian Idol 16 – “Yaadon Ki Playlist” celebrates music that brings back cherished memories and emotions. For the first time ever, auditions go outdoors, traveling across India to discover raw talent, hosted by the legendary Udit Narayan, while Aditya Narayan returns as the main host. The judges - Vishal Dadlani, Shreya Ghoshal, and Badshah - search for voices that touch hearts. A season where every song is a memory, and every melody tells a story.
video_info.longDescription: Indian Idol 16 – “Yaadon Ki Playlist” celebrates music that brings back cherished memories and emotions. For the first time ever, auditions go outdoors, traveling across India to discover raw talent, hosted by the legendary Udit Narayan, while Aditya Narayan returns as the main host. The judges - Vishal Dadlani, Shreya Ghoshal, and Badshah - search for voices that touch hearts. A season where every song is a memory, and every melody tells a story.

video_info.shortDescription: Birmingham City host Leeds United promising a competitive encounter, with a place in the Fifth Round at stake and both sides showing resilience in their respective campaigns. Catch all action from the Emirates FA Cup 2025-26, LIVE on Sony LIV.

video_info.title: Bundesliga 2025-26
video_info.shortDescription: Augsburg host bottom‑placed Heidenheim in a crucial relegation battle, entering the match with stronger form and a six‑game unbeaten home run. Heidenheim, winless since early December and struggling defensively with the league’s highest goals conceded, face an uphill task to turn their fortunes around. Find out who comes on top. Catch all the action from Bundesliga 2025-26, LIVE on Sony LIV.
video_info.longDescription: Augsburg host bottom‑placed Heidenheim in a crucial relegation battle, entering the match with stronger form and a six‑game unbeaten home run. Heidenheim, winless since early December and struggling defensively with the league’s highest goals conceded, face an uphill task to turn their fortunes around. Find out who comes on top. Catch all the action from Bundesliga 2025-26, LIVE on Sony LIV.
